title: Enhanced photocatalytic activity of porous TiO2 containing C/P/K derived from grapefruit peel
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15604-15618
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02180K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ruixiang Wu, Wenhua Liu, Renao Bai, Xiufang Tian, Weikai Lin, Lejian Li, Qianwei Ke
This study presents a method for synthesizing high-efficiency photocatalysts by using grapefruit peel to create porous TiO2 containing C, P, and K. innovating photocatalytic material preparation.
